quizzes.question: Which choice is the default value for the transform-origin property?
Which value type is used in the skew function?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]The skew() Method[/h1]

The [b]skew()[/b] method skews an element along the x-axis and the y-axis by the given angles.

The following example skews the <div> element by 30 degrees along the X-axis: [code format="css" codeId="627"]transform: skew(30deg);[/code]
[b]Result:[/b] [img id="2712" width="100%"]
[note]If the second parameter is not specified, it has a zero value.[/note]
